item.title: Downloading communism...
item.description: Eigentlich war es ja als Witz gedacht, aber die Mediendinosaurier nehmen so etwas schon mal ernst. Schreibt der Inquirer : A MAFIAA CABAL called the International Intellectual Property Alliance, which is an umbrella group for the entertainment cartels such as the MPAA and RIAA, has demanded that Indonesia, Brazil and India should be placed on a special trade watchlist merely because they recommend the use of open source software.
